trans-unit.source: Enumerates values for lengths of <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisBreak" name="EmphasisBreak" href=""></xref> between spoken words.
trans-unit.target: Enumera os valores de comprimentos de <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisBreak" name="EmphasisBreak" href=""> </xref> entre as palavras ditas.

trans-unit.source: The break emphasis is set for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: O ênfase quebra está definido para <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>instâncias através da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>propriedade no <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>objecto devolvido pela <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>propriedade numa instância do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: Each synthetic speech engine is free to determine how to render breaks between words; the nature of emphasis differs between languages, dialects, genders, or voices.
trans-unit.target: Cada motor de reconhecimento de voz sintético é gratuito determinar como compor quebras de linha entre as palavras; a natureza ênfase difere entre idiomas, dialetos, genders ou voices.

trans-unit.source: Both EmphasisBreak and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> may be used when setting or getting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ambos os EmphasisBreak e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>pode ser utilizado quando definir ou obter o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>num <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>instância.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>

trans-unit.source: The two values may be distinguished by the fact that the actual values of EmphasisBreak are all less than zero and values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> are greater than or equal to zero; and by using the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance.
trans-unit.target: Os dois valores podem ser distinguidos pelo facto de que os valores reais de EmphasisBreak todos os inferior a zero e os valores de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>são maior que ou igual a zero; e utilizando o valor de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>devolvido pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>objecto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>propriedade numa instância.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>

A partir de mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>
